author: jtraglia
content: Consensus devs, we've published the [v1.6.0-alpha.5](https://github.com/ethereum/consensus-specs/releases/tag/v1.6.0-alpha.5) release. It includes the new slot component time configuration values (which you can ignore until glamsterdam) and changes `MAX_BLOB_COMMITMENTS_PER_BLOCK` for minimal to match the mainnet value.
